summary: A film about Mark David Chapman in the days leading up to the infamous murder of Beatle John Lennon.
cast: Chuck Cooper|Victor Verhaeghe|Robert Gerard Larkin|Lindsay Lohan|Ursula Abbott|Roy Milton Davis|Brian Bell|Dan Schultz|Adam Scarimbolo|Molly Griffith|Spiro Malas|Jeane Fournier|Kate Higgins|Matthew Nardozzi|Brian O'Neill|Matthew Humphreys|Judah Friedlander|Le Clanché du Rand|Yuuki Hosokawa|Jamie Tirelli|Michael Sirow|Mariko Takai|Mark Lindsay Chapman|Jared Leto|Laura Lynn Berrios|George Bryant II|Kevin Cannon|Bill Chemerka|Melissa Demyan|Vikki Eugenis|Dennis Jay Funny|Vivian Kalinov|Sergio Kato|Redman Maxfield|Lisa Marie Palmieri|Vincent James Russo|Nicki Sixteen|Jeff Skowron|Joey Sontz|Erik Wolfe
keywords: murder|death|based on true story|john lennon character|downward spiral
title: El asesinato de John Lennon
